interventions.name: Turn and reposition patient every 2 hours.
interventions.definition: Change the patient's position to relieve pressure on bony prominences.

interventions.name: Provide patient with pressure-relieving mattress.
interventions.definition: Use a mattress designed to reduce pressure on bony prominences.
interventions.duration: Until risk of pressure ulcers is resolved

interventions.name: Range of motion exercises.
interventions.definition: Perform range of motion exercises to maintain joint mobility.

interventions.name: Ambulation with assistive device.
interventions.definition: Assist patient with ambulation using a walker or cane.
interventions.duration: Until patient is able to ambulate independently

evaluations.result: Patient's skin is intact without any signs of pressure ulcers.
Patient is able to ambulate independently with a walker.
